name: Fourth Dimension
overview:
Fourth Dimension is a pioneer in the field of leveraging media and narrative to enhance brands as a business asset. Through the combination of rigorous strategy, analysis and creativity, we help clients create and manage brand value and messaging in all market dynamics and across all media platforms.

Fourth Dimension is a full-service digital agency with a focus on measurable results. We create and execute data-driven digital strategies that maximize our clients return on investment. Our team has built and managed complex web-based applications and deployed creative strategies across all digital touchpoints. Since 2005 Fourth Dimension has offered custom integrated strategies and execution to meet a variety of client needs. Fourth Dimension has built proprietary online and offline applications that deliver results in marketing, training and customer service - for powering the new age business on the go and creating the best possible user experience, in person, at home and on the go with mobile offline and online marketing.

We have built a solid reputation for providing innovative design and technology solutions, for both our B2B and B2C clients. Creating new business and services through digital media innovation.
